    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2375</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Center of Gravity of a system of objects</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerpunkt eines Systems der Nachrichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Centre de la gravité d'un système des objets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Centro de gravidade de um sistema dos objetos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Centro di gravità di un sistema degli oggetti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κέντρο βάρους ενός συστήματος των αντικειμένων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Centro de gravedad de un sistema de objetos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which explores the ways in which the center of gravity of several objects can be maintained when arranging those objects.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">center of gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">scientific concepts</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die Methoden erforscht, in 
denen der Schwerpunkt einiger Nachrichten beibehalten werden kann, 
wenn man jene Nachrichten ordnet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui explore les voies dont le centre
de la gravité de plusieurs objets peut être mis à jour en 
arrangeant ces objets.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que explore as maneiras em que o 
centro de gravidade de diversos objetos pode ser mantido ao arranjar 
aqueles objetos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che esaminare le modalità in cui 
il centro di gravità di parecchi oggetti può essere effettuato 
quando organizza quegli oggetti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που ερευνά τους τρόπους με τους οποίους
το την κέντρο βάρους διάφορων αντικειμένων μπορεί να διατηρηθεί 
κατά τακτοποίηση εκείνων των αντικειμένων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que explora las maneras de las 
cuales el centro de gravedad de varios objetos puede ser mantenido al 
arreglar esos objetos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
